main event: Three military observers reported witnessing a tear drop shaped, bluish-white object disintegrate in the sky approximately 40 miles NE of Las Vegas, Nevada on 18 July 1963.
interesting points: The object was sighted for about 4 minutes with a contrail lasting 10 minutes., The observers included Major Warren H. Williams and several other military personnel., The sighting coincided with a potential missile launch from Point Arguello., The sighting occurred under clear weather with unlimited visibility., The object was described as pea-sized before disintegration.
witness description: military personnel including officers and a sergeant
